Test Case Name: Search for an existing product by exact full name
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Navigate to Home Page. 2. Type 'Blue Top' into the search bar. 3. Click the search icon.
Expected Result: 'SEARCHED PRODUCTS' title is displayed. Only 'Blue Top' product card is displayed in results.

Test Case Name: Search for an existing product by partial name
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Navigate to Home Page. 2. Type 'Dress' into the search bar. 3. Click the search icon.
Expected Result: 'SEARCHED PRODUCTS' title is displayed. All products containing 'Dress' in their name (e.g., 'Sleeveless Dress', 'Stylish Dress') are displayed.

Steps to Reproduce: 1. Navigate to Home Page. 2. Type 'men tshirt' (lowercase) into the search bar. 3. Click the search icon.
Expected Result: 'SEARCHED PRODUCTS' title is displayed. 'Men Tshirt' is displayed.
